title: Flights & Flatbread with HALL Family Wines
description:
Join us on Tuesday, June 17, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for an evening of Flights & Flatbread featuring an exceptional tasting of HALL Family Wines, hosted by Regional Manager Erin Hamada-Bigelow. Enjoy a flight of four wines along with a delicious flatbread as you explore the renowned portfolio of HALL, WALT, and BACA.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Includes a flatbread and a tasting of four wines)

Reserve your spot

Featured Wines:

  • Hall Cabernet Sauvignon 2020 – Fresh and elegant with black currant, raspberry, sage, crushed rose, and fennel, finishing long and rich with supple tannins.
  • Walt La Brisa Pinot Noir 2022 – 93 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Focused and vibrant with cinnamon, Bing cherry, mint, and tangerine peel on a seamless finish.
  • BACA Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2023 – Dense and ripe with cassis, blackberry pastries, fine tannins, and a touch of oak for a fresh, early-drinking style.
  • Walt Sonoma Coast Chardonnay 2022 – 92 pts, Wine Enthusiast. Mineral-driven with tangerine, Meyer lemon, and pomelo, balanced by bright acidity and a touch of barrel spice.

Experience the craftsmanship and innovation that define HALL Family Wines—an unforgettable evening of wine and food awaits.
